sentences.en: A line of tractors rumbled onto the motorway through a cordon of police.
sentences.cn: 一列拖拉机突破了警戒线，隆隆响着驶上了高速公路。

sentences.en: Blue cheese, blueberries and chicken cordon bleu - but blue ketchup?
sentences.cn: 蓝色奶酪 、 蓝莓、法国蓝带鸡胸 -- 蓝色番茄酱?

sentences.en: But today, all they did was to break through the cordon!
sentences.cn: 然而今天, 只是冲过!

sentences.en: Get a cordon sanitaire that neither intrude upon. Then they can go on quietly talking.
sentences.cn: 确定一条双方都不可侵犯的警戒线, 然后,他们就可以平静地讨论.

sentences.en: I took a cordon bleu cookery course.
People without fixed duties mustn't walk past the crime scene's police cordon.
sentences.cn: 在办案现场闲杂人等不得越过警戒线.

sentences.en: Police formed a cordon between the two crowds.
sentences.cn: 警察在两群人之间筑起了一道封锁线。

sentences.en: Police officers threw a cordon around his car to protect him.
sentences.cn: 警察在他汽车周围设置了防卫圈以保护他.

sentences.en: Scotland Yard said a cordon was used because missiles were being thrown at officers.
sentences.cn: 苏格兰场说使用警戒线是因为一直有投掷物扔向警察.

sentences.en: Soon after the incident, Pakistani Frontier Corps and police put a security cordon around the area.
sentences.cn: 在事件发生后不久, 巴基斯坦边境的军队和警察在该地区周围设下了安全警戒线.

sentences.en: The miners were armed with clubs as they forced their way through a police cordon.
sentences.cn: 矿工们手持棍棒冲过了警戒线。

sentences.en: There is a tight security cordon around the area.
sentences.cn: 这一地区周围设有严密的安全警戒圈.

sentences.en: There was a police cordon Near school where I left your son.
sentences.cn: 我送儿子到学校在学校的附近有警察的警戒线.

sentences.en: To have broken through a cordon of policemen and mounted patrols and armoured cars!
sentences.cn: 冲破了巡捕,骑巡,装甲汽车,密密层层的警戒网!

trans.tran_en: a line of police officers, soldiers, or vehicles that is put around an area to stop people going there
